steps.conclusion: None. The suggestion follows the special rule for language exams: exactly one suggestion with the exam name, in Portuguese output context. None. The title “TOEFL” is acceptable per the exam rule. The description is one sentence in Portuguese. No extra suggestions were added. All required fields are present.
